fields:
[{"name":"NORMAL","type":"int","description":"Represents a “normal” style for a font. This text is an example of a normal font style. "},{"name":"BOLD","type":"int","description":"Represents a bold style for a font, which has heavier lines.

This is some example bold text.

"},{"name":"ITALIC","type":"int","description":"Represents an italic style for a font, which is slanted forward. This is some example italic text."},{"name":"BOLD_ITALIC","type":"int","description":"Represents a bold and italic style for a font.

This is an example of bold italic text.

"}]
name: FontStyle
